HACKER_TEAMS_ANNOUNCMENT_TEXT:
Create a new team or join an existing one for the weekend! Due to prize arrangements, the maximum number of hackers per team is 4.

There will also be opportunities at the event to form teams.
HACKER_TEAMS_FOOTER_TEXT: You can join and leave a team at any time.

HELP_TEXT: Please contact us at info@vandyhacks.org with any questions or concerns, and we'd be happy to help you!
